predictions.article: Rollins Promises Grain Farmers Improving Ag Economy is a Top Priority
predictions.prediction: The USDA's release of $30 billion in economic assistance through the Emergency Commodity Assistance Program (ECAP) will lead to a measurable increase in farmer sentiment and economic activity in rural areas within the next month.

predictions.article: Trade war escalates as retaliatory tariffs hit struggling farm economy
